1: <pb/><e>Sb'it jun tic vin̈aj David.</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, ab' in lesal, cham val ab'an tas svala'. Tac'van̈ d'ayin, ina to te tojol ach, tzac'ann̈ejelc'och tas tzala'.</t>
2: <t>Man̈ a c'anb'ej tas vaj a in a checab' in tic, yujto malaj junoc mach vach' yaj d'a a sat.</t>
3: <t>Ix in pechji b'eyec' yuj eb' ayoch ajc'olal d'ayin, ix in stec'anem eb' d'a sat luum. Ix in yac' cajnaj eb' d'a scal q'uic'alq'uinal, icha val yaj eb' chamnacxo.</t>
4: <t>Man̈xo animaoc vaj ticnaic svab'i, te somchajnac in c'ool.</t>
5: <t>Tzin nacot juntzan̈ c'ual ec'nac d'a peca', tzin naub'tan̈an masanil tas a b'onac d'a yalan̈tax chi'.</t>
6: <t>A d'ayach tzin mojb'ejq'ue in c'ab', tzach in nib'ej val, icha val junoc lum taquin̈ luum snib'an a a'.</t>
7: <t>Mamin Jehová, tac'van̈ d'ayin d'a elan̈chamel, toxo val tz'el in c'ol svab'i. Man̈ a yaej a colval d'ayin. Icha val eb' chamnac smucchajemi, icham chi' ol in ajoc tato tza yaej a colval d'ayin.</t>
8: <t>Ac' in nacot a vach'c'olal d'a junjun q'uin̈ib'alil, ina to a ach tzach vac'och yipoc in c'ool. Ch'ox d'ayin tas ol aj in b'eyb'ati, yujto van in lesalvi d'ayach.</t>
9: <t>Mamin Jehová, colinel d'a yol sc'ab' eb' ajc'ool, yujto a d'ayach tzin say in colnab'il.</t>
10: <t>C'ayb'ej in yic tzin b'o icha tas tza nib'ej, yujto in Diosal ach. Aocab' Espíritu vach' tzin ic'an b'ey d'a a vach' b'eyb'al.</t>
11: <t>Mamin, man̈ in a cha chamoc, yic vach' max alchaj chucal lolonel d'ayach. Ic' in elta d'a scal vilc'olal, yujto vach' ach toni.</t>
12: <t>Yuj a vach'c'olal d'ayin, yuj chi' tza satcanel masanil eb' ayoch ajc'olal d'ayin, yujto a checab' in.</t>
